item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Suggested text: Our website address is: http://groceria.madrasthemes.com.

Comments

Suggested text: When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

Suggested text: If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Cookies

Suggested text: If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Suggested text: Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Who we share your data with

Suggested text: If you request a password reset, your IP address will be included in the reset email.

How long we retain your data

Suggested text: If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

Suggested text: If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where your data is sent

Suggested text: Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.content:encoded:
This is a sample page.

Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we can’t offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, you’ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasn’t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

item.title: The best healthy-ish treats in our store right now
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded:
When it comes to gut health, the foods you eat play a crucial role in maintaining a healthy digestive system. But who says gut-friendly foods have to be bland and boring? In fact, there are plenty of delicious options that are not only good for your gut but also tantalize your taste buds.

What makes a food gut-friendly?

Gut-friendly foods are those that promote a healthy balance of gut bacteria, support digestion, and reduce inflammation in the gut. These foods are typically rich in fiber, prebiotics, and probiotics, which are essential for maintaining a healthy gut microbiome.

I love to design things that people can actually buy. I'm staggered by
what a boot costs today.

Ali Tufan - Trip Advisor

Top gut-friendly foods that are actually tasty

1. Greek Yogurt: Packed with probiotics, Greek yogurt is not only creamy and delicious but also great for your gut health. Look for varieties that contain live and active cultures for maximum benefit.
2. Berries: Berries like blueberries, raspberries, and strawberries are not only sweet and juicy but also high in fiber and antioxidants, making them excellent choices for gut health.
3. Oats: Oats are a great source of soluble fiber, which helps promote healthy digestion and feed beneficial gut bacteria. Plus, they make a hearty and satisfying breakfast option.
4. Fermented Foods: Foods like kimchi, sauerkraut, and kombucha are rich in probiotics that help support a healthy gut microbiome. Plus, they add a tangy and flavorful kick to your meals.
5. Almonds: Almonds are a good source of fiber, protein, and healthy fats, making them a great snack option for gut health. They are also versatile and can be enjoyed on their own or added to salads and stir-fries.

Reducing Packaging Waste

Packaging waste is a significant contributor to environmental degradation, and at Loka, we are actively working to reduce it. Many of our products come in eco-friendly packaging, such as recyclable, compostable, or biodegradable materials. We also encourage customers to bring their own reusable bags when shopping in-store.

1. Greek Yogurt: Packed with probiotics, Greek yogurt is not only creamy and delicious but also great for your gut health. Look for varieties that contain live and active cultures for maximum benefit.
2. Berries: Berries like blueberries, raspberries, and strawberries are not only sweet and juicy but also high in fiber and antioxidants, making them excellent choices for gut health.
3. Oats: Oats are a great source of soluble fiber, which helps promote healthy digestion and feed beneficial gut bacteria. Plus, they make a hearty and satisfying breakfast option.
4. Fermented Foods: Foods like kimchi, sauerkraut, and kombucha are rich in probiotics that help support a healthy gut microbiome. Plus, they add a tangy and flavorful kick to your meals.
5. Almonds: Almonds are a good source of fiber, protein, and healthy fats, making them a great snack option for gut health. They are also versatile and can be enjoyed on their own or added to salads and stir-fries.

Reducing Packaging Waste

Packaging waste is a significant contributor to environmental degradation, and at Loka, we are actively working to reduce it. Many of our products come in eco-friendly packaging, such as recyclable, compostable, or biodegradable materials. We also encourage customers to bring their own reusable bags when shopping in-store.

When it comes to gut health, the foods you eat play a crucial role in maintaining a healthy digestive system. But who says gut-friendly foods have to be bland and boring? In fact, there are plenty of delicious options that are not only good for your gut but also tantalize your taste buds.

What makes a food gut-friendly?

Gut-friendly foods are those that promote a healthy balance of gut bacteria, support digestion, and reduce inflammation in the gut. These foods are typically rich in fiber, prebiotics, and probiotics, which are essential for maintaining a healthy gut microbiome.

item.title: Mango Juice
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Bright, tropical, and naturally sweet — our Mango Juice is crafted from ripe, sun-kissed mangoes for a refreshingly smooth experience. Enjoy it chilled for a burst of sunshine in every glass.
item.excerpt:encoded: Tropical and naturally sweet, perfect for refreshing moments.

item.title: Yirgacheffe Organic
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Grown in the highlands of Ethiopia, our Yirgacheffe Organic coffee delivers floral notes and a hint of citrus in every sip. Ethically sourced and organically grown, it’s a favorite among true coffee lovers.
item.excerpt:encoded: Bright Ethiopian coffee with floral notes and citrus hints.

item.title: Pumpernickel Bread
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Dense, hearty, and rich with earthy flavor, our Pumpernickel Bread is a classic European-style loaf made with whole rye flour. Perfect for sandwiches, toasting, or a savory cheese board.
item.excerpt:encoded: Dense, hearty rye bread with deep, rich flavor.

item.title: Porcini Mushrooms
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Hand-harvested and deeply aromatic, Porcini Mushrooms bring rich umami flavor to soups, risottos, and gourmet sauces. A must-have for serious home cooks and foodies alike.
item.excerpt:encoded: Earthy, aromatic mushrooms ideal for gourmet cooking.

item.title: Coming soon
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded:
Coming soon

We’re preparing something special — our store will be live soon!

Made with MadrasThemes.

item.title: Original Waffles
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Crispy on the outside, fluffy on the inside — our Original Waffles are ready to toast and serve in minutes. Made with simple ingredients for that homemade taste your mornings deserve.
item.excerpt:encoded: Crispy and fluffy, made for easy, delicious breakfasts.

item.title: Garden-Fresh Spring Shoots
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Crisp, mild, and bursting with freshness, these spring onions are handpicked at their peak for maximum flavor and crunch. Perfect for garnishing soups, tossing in salads, or adding a fresh twist to your stir-fry.
item.excerpt:encoded: Tender spring onions for a fresh, mild crunch.

item.title: Golden Sunset Mango
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Sink your teeth into the sweet, tropical richness of Golden Sunset Mangoes. Grown in sun-drenched orchards, these vibrant fruits are juicy, fragrant, and perfect for smoothies, snacks, or desserts.
item.excerpt:encoded: Juicy, sun-ripened mangoes with tropical sweetness.

item.title: Black Angus Brioche Burger
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Indulge in gourmet flavor with our Black Angus Brioche Burger — a thick, juicy patty of premium Angus beef nestled in a soft, buttery brioche bun. Ideal for backyard barbecues or an elevated weeknight meal.
item.excerpt:encoded: Premium Angus beef patty on a soft brioche bun.

item.title: Crimson Jewel Berries
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: These strawberries aren’t just sweet — they’re radiant. Crimson Jewel Berries are hand-selected for their deep red color, lush aroma, and irresistibly juicy bite. Enjoy them fresh, dipped in chocolate, or on top of your favorite dessert.
item.excerpt:encoded: Lush red strawberries bursting with sweet, juicy flavor.

item.title: Velvet Ruby Plums
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Rich in color and bursting with flavor, Velvet Ruby Plums offer a perfect balance of sweet and tart. Their velvety skin and juicy flesh make them a luxurious addition to fruit bowls, tarts, or cheese boards.
item.excerpt:encoded: Sweet-tart plums with velvety skin and juicy flesh.

item.title: Gluten-Free Forbidden Rice Batard, Frozen
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Crafted with black forbidden rice and a gluten-free blend, this batard-style loaf delivers a rich, nutty flavor and chewy interior. Frozen for freshness and ready to bake — a wholesome alternative for bread lovers.
item.excerpt:encoded: Nutty, chewy black rice loaf — gluten-free and bake-ready.

item.title: Chicken, Air-Chilled, Raised w/o Antibiotics
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Tender, juicy chicken raised without antibiotics and processed using an air-chilling method that locks in flavor without added water. Perfect for healthy home cooking with confidence.
item.excerpt:encoded: Juicy, clean-label chicken processed without added water.

item.title: Doubles Plus Paper Towels
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Super absorbent and extra durable, Doubles Plus Paper Towels handle the messiest spills with ease. Each roll lasts longer, making cleanup quick and efficient — and kinder to the planet.
item.excerpt:encoded: Ultra-absorbent towels for heavy-duty household cleaning.

item.title: Popcorn, Original
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Light, airy, and perfectly crunchy — this Original Popcorn is a timeless snack made with simple ingredients. Great for movie nights, lunchboxes, or guilt-free munching anytime.
item.excerpt:encoded: Light, crunchy, and classic — your everyday snack.

item.title: Grade A Dark Amber Maple Syrup
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Rich, full-bodied maple syrup with a deep amber color and bold flavor.Harvested from pure maple trees and crafted without additives.Perfect for pancakes, waffles, baking, and sweetening beverages.100% natural, Grade A quality, and packed with authentic taste.A versatile sweetener that enhances both sweet and savory dishes.Sustainably sourced to bring you the purest maple experience.Enjoy a timeless classic that brings warmth and richness to every meal.
item.excerpt:encoded: Rich, full-bodied maple syrup with a deep amber color and bold flavor.Harvested from pure maple trees and crafted without additives.Perfect for pancakes, waffles, baking, and sweetening beverages.100% natural, Grade A quality, and packed with authentic taste.

item.title: Mini Pretzels, Family Size
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Crispy, salty, and perfectly bite-sized — our Mini Pretzels come in a generous family-size bag for sharing (or not). A snack-time staple that everyone loves.
item.excerpt:encoded: Crispy snack-time favorite in a generous sharing pack.

item.title: Creamy Peanut Butter
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Smooth, rich, and irresistibly creamy peanut butter made from high-quality roasted peanuts.A natural source of protein and energy, perfect for spreading, dipping, or blending into smoothies. Gluten-free, non-GMO, and free from artificial additives.The classic pantry staple for both kids and adults to enjoy every day.
item.excerpt:encoded: Smooth, rich, and irresistibly creamy peanut butter made from high-quality roasted peanuts.A natural source of protein and energy, perfect for spreading, dipping, or blending into smoothies. Gluten-free, non-GMO, and free from artificial additives.The classic pantry staple for both kids and adults to enjoy every day.

item.title: Baby Bananas, Bunch
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Small in size, big in sweetness — Baby Bananas are naturally creamy and packed with flavor. Ideal for kids' lunches, blending into smoothies, or enjoying on the go.
item.excerpt:encoded: Naturally sweet, mini-sized bananas perfect for snacking.

item.title: Cal-Organic Jumbo Carrots
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Bold in size and rich in earthy sweetness, these Cal-Organic Jumbo Carrots are perfect for roasting, juicing, or chopping into hearty stews. Grown with care and harvested at peak flavor.
item.excerpt:encoded: Large, crisp carrots great for juicing or roasting.

item.title: Cara Cara Orange
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: A citrus lover’s dream, Cara Cara Oranges are low in acid and beautifully pink inside. Sweet, tangy, and full of vitamin C — they make snacking feel like sunshine.Sweet, seedless, and naturally pink-fleshed oranges with a hint of berry-like flavor.Packed with vitamin C, antioxidants, and refreshing juiciness in every bite.Perfect for snacking, juicing, or brightening up your favorite recipes.Non-GMO and hand-picked for the freshest taste.
item.excerpt:encoded: Sweet, seedless, and naturally pink-fleshed oranges with a hint of berry-like flavor.Packed with vitamin C, antioxidants, and refreshing juiciness in every bite.Perfect for snacking, juicing, or brightening up your favorite recipes.Non-GMO and hand-picked for the freshest taste.

item.title: Wine grapes
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: With their delicate skin and honeyed, floral flavor, wine grapes are a gourmet snack. Enjoy them fresh or paired with cheese and nuts.
item.excerpt:encoded: Sweet, juicy grapes often used for snacking or winemaking.

item.title: Dessert Apple
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Crisp, sweet, and beautifully blushed, dessert apples are nature’s candy. A delightful snack on their own or sliced into pies and tarts.
item.excerpt:encoded: Sweet, juicy apples ideal for desserts or a healthy treat.

item.title: Muscat Grapes
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Muscat Grapes offer a unique floral aroma and honeyed flavor that sets them apart. Juicy and fragrant, they’re a gourmet grape variety you’ll want to savor fresh.
item.excerpt:encoded: Fragrant, juicy grapes with a honey-like floral taste.

item.title: Cantaloupe
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Bursting with juicy sweetness and floral aroma, cantaloupes are a summer delight. Their tender orange flesh is perfect for fresh fruit bowls, smoothies, or simply chilled and sliced.
item.excerpt:encoded: Juicy, sweet melon perfect for snacking or fruit salads.

item.title: Garlic
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Pungent, earthy, and powerful — garlic is the backbone of bold cooking. Whether roasted for mellow sweetness or minced raw for a sharp punch, it brings life to every savory dish.
item.excerpt:encoded: Fresh, aromatic bulbs to enhance every savory dish.

item.title: Jumbo Yellow Onion
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: These oversized onions are prized for their sweet depth and mellow flavor. Perfect for caramelizing, roasting, or adding body to soups and stews. A kitchen essential.
item.excerpt:encoded: Bold and flavorful — ideal for soups, stir-fries, and grilling.

item.title: Organic Cauliflower
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Clean, nutty, and naturally versatile, organic cauliflower transforms into everything from a golden roast to a low-carb mash. Its tightly packed florets are as nutritious as they are delicious.
item.excerpt:encoded: Crisp, organic florets great for roasting or mashing.

item.title: Organic Scallions
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Delicately zesty and crisp, these organic scallions brighten salads, soups, and stir-fries. Both the green tops and white bulbs offer a light oniony bite.
item.excerpt:encoded: Mild and zesty green onions for garnishes or cooking.

item.title: Organic Artichoke
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: With tender leaves and a buttery heart, organic artichokes are a true delicacy. Steam them whole or bake into dips — their rich, earthy flavor is unmistakably gourmet.
item.excerpt:encoded: Tender and earthy, perfect for steaming or dips.

item.title: Organic No Caffeine Coffee Alternative
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: A cozy, caffeine-free brew crafted from roasted herbs and grains. Rich, earthy, and smooth — it mimics coffee’s depth without the jitters. Ideal for mindful sipping. Experience the rich and full-bodied flavor of our Organic No Caffeine Coffee Alternative. Made from only the finest organic ingredients, this caffeine-free alternative offers all the benefits of coffee without the jitters and crashes. Savor every sip, guilt-free.
item.excerpt:encoded: Experience the rich and full-bodied flavor of our Organic No Caffeine Coffee Alternative. Made from only the finest organic ingredients, this caffeine-free alternative offers all the benefits of coffee without the jitters and crashes. Savor every sip, guilt-free.

item.title: Oven-Ready Butter Croissants
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Layered with creamy butter and frozen for your convenience, these croissants bake into golden, flaky perfection. A bakery-quality treat fresh from your oven.
item.excerpt:encoded: Flaky, buttery croissants ready to bake fresh at home.

item.title: Celebration Cupcakes
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Whimsical and sweet, these frosted cupcakes are topped with colorful sprinkles and party-ready cheer. Perfect for birthdays or any little celebration.
item.excerpt:encoded: Colorful, frosted treats that make every day a party.

item.title: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Soft, chewy, and warmly spiced, these cookies blend hearty oats and plump raisins. A comforting, classic treat with home-baked charm.
item.excerpt:encoded: Soft, chewy, and packed with hearty oats and sweet raisins.

item.title: Seven Layer Cake
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: A showstopping dessert stacked high with rich layers of cake, cream, and chocolate. Every slice is a blend of textures and indulgence.
item.excerpt:encoded: A decadent dessert stacked with rich, indulgent layers.

item.title: Local Bunched Spinach
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Hand-harvested from nearby farms, this spinach is tender, vibrant, and nutrient-dense. Ideal for fresh salads or quick sautés.
item.excerpt:encoded: Fresh-picked leafy greens, rich in flavor and nutrients.

item.title: Organic Valley Half & Half
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: A creamy, luxurious blend of organic milk and cream. Whether enriching coffee or elevating recipes, it brings farm-fresh richness to your kitchen.
item.excerpt:encoded: Creamy and smooth — perfect for coffee or cooking.

item.title: Boneless Skinless Chicken Breast
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Lean, tender, and ready to cook — these chicken breasts are a healthy protein choice for grilling, stir-frying, or oven-roasting.
item.excerpt:encoded: Lean, tender chicken — ideal for grilling, baking, or pan-frying.

item.title: Simply Low-Fat Cottage Cheese
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Creamy, satisfying, and full of protein — this low-fat cottage cheese offers a smooth texture with a hint of tang. Great as a snack or topping.
item.excerpt:encoded: Light, creamy, and packed with protein.

item.title: Unsweetened, Plastic Bottle
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Clean hydration in a convenient bottle — this unsweetened drink is free from sugars and additives, offering pure refreshment on the go. (Assumed to be water or tea.)
item.excerpt:encoded: Pure and clean refreshment — no sugar, no fuss.

item.title: Rao'sHomemade Marinara Sauce
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Crafted from slow-simmered tomatoes, olive oil, garlic, and herbs, Rao’s brings old-world Italian flavor straight to your table. No shortcuts, just tradition.
item.excerpt:encoded: Slow-simmered, classic Italian flavor in every spoonful.

item.title: Organic Whole Milk
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Full-bodied and velvety, this organic whole milk delivers farm-fresh creaminess with every pour. Ideal for cereals, baking, or enjoying by the glass.
item.excerpt:encoded: Rich, creamy, and wholesome — straight from organic farms.

item.title: Armenian Cucumber
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Long, ridged, and refreshingly mild, Armenian cucumbers are delightfully crisp with a hint of melon-like sweetness. Perfect raw or pickled.
item.excerpt:encoded: Crisp and mild with a refreshing crunch — perfect for salads and snacking.

item.title: Fage Creamy Dreamy, Banana Cream
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Ultra-thick Greek yogurt layered with luscious banana cream. A dreamy treat that balances rich indulgence with wholesome satisfaction.
item.excerpt:encoded: Thick Greek yogurt with rich banana cream indulgence.

item.title: Green Cauliflower
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: A vibrant, naturally colorful twist on traditional cauliflower. Its sweet, mild flavor makes it perfect for roasting or vibrant veggie platters.
item.excerpt:encoded: A colorful twist on a classic veggie — mild, crisp, and great for roasting.

item.title: Cherry tomato
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Tiny, vibrant, and bursting with sweetness, cherry tomatoes are a kitchen favorite — snackable raw or roasted to bring out their natural sugars.
item.excerpt:encoded: Bite-sized bursts of juicy, tangy flavor — salad-ready.

item.title: Stalk Celery
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Crisp and hydrating with a clean, peppery snap. Celery stalks are ideal for snacking, juicing, or adding crunch to soups and stews.
item.excerpt:encoded: Crunchy, hydrating, and perfect for snacks, soups, or juice.

item.title: Cape Cod Potato Chips
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Hand-cooked in small batches for an extra-crunchy bite, Cape Cod Chips bring a satisfying saltiness and rustic texture that chip lovers crave. Perfectly crisp and deeply golden.
item.excerpt:encoded: Kettle-cooked crunch with bold, classic flavor.

item.title: Skinny Pop Popcorn
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Light, airy, and deliciously clean — Skinny Pop is made with just popcorn, oil, and salt. A guilt-free snack you’ll keep reaching for. No artificial anything.
item.excerpt:encoded: Light, airy popcorn with simple, clean ingredients.

item.title: Lesser Evil Popcorn
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Delicious, air-popped organic popcorn made with clean, simple ingredients. Gluten-free, non-GMO, and perfectly seasoned for a guilt-free snack.Packed with wholesome flavor, it’s the smarter way to satisfy your cravings anytime.Available in a variety of fun flavors the whole family will love.Made with organic coconut oil and Himalayan pink salt for a healthier crunch.A light, crunchy snack you can enjoy at home, work, or on the go.
item.excerpt:encoded: Delicious, air-popped organic popcorn made with clean, simple ingredients. Gluten-free, non-GMO, and perfectly seasoned for a guilt-free snack. Packed with wholesome flavor, it’s the smarter way to satisfy your cravings anytime.Available in a variety of fun flavors the whole family will love.

item.title: Hampton Farms
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Fresh-roasted peanuts straight from the shell — rich, nutty, and perfectly salted. A classic American snack packed with flavor and crunch.
item.excerpt:encoded: Fresh, flavorful peanuts — perfect for snacking or game nights.

item.title: Pistachios
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Naturally vibrant and full of buttery flavor, pistachios make a nutritious snack or topping. Crack open the shell and enjoy the crunch of pure green goodness.
item.excerpt:encoded: Nutty, protein-packed snack in a satisfying shell.

item.title: Organic Mangoes
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Lush, juicy, and sun-ripened — these organic mangoes burst with tropical sweetness. Slice them for smoothies, salads, or pure fruit joy.
item.excerpt:encoded: Lusciously sweet, sun-ripened, and certified organic.

item.title: Brioche crescent
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Buttery, golden, and slightly sweet, brioche crescents are soft, pillowy pastries perfect for breakfast spreads or elegant brunches.
item.excerpt:encoded: Buttery, soft, and flaky rolls — a French bakery classic.

item.title: Chobani Greek yogurt
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Thick, creamy, and crafted with live cultures, Chobani yogurt delivers rich flavor and protein in every spoonful — real fruit, no nonsense.
item.excerpt:encoded: Rich and creamy yogurt made with real fruit and live cultures.

item.title: Lemon Myrtle
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Native to Australia, this citrusy herb brings bright, lemon-lime notes to teas, desserts, and seasoning blends. Fragrant and refreshingly zesty.
item.excerpt:encoded: A zesty Australian herb — adds citrusy aroma and flavor to teas or dishes.

item.title: Sabra Guacamole
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Smooth and creamy with chunks of ripe avocado, Sabra Guacamole blends just the right amount of zest, spice, and freshness in every scoop.
item.excerpt:encoded: Smooth and creamy dip made with fresh avocados and zesty spices.

item.title: Polly-o spring Cheese
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Mild, creamy mozzarella made fun — Polly-O string cheese is a peelable snack that’s wholesome, kid-friendly, and endlessly snackable.
item.excerpt:encoded: Classic mozzarella string cheese — fun and tasty for all ages.

item.title: Sabra Smart Snackers
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: A convenient, grab-and-go combo of hummus and crispy pretzels. Perfect for school bags, office desks, or anytime hunger strikes smartly.
item.excerpt:encoded: Convenient snack packs pairing dips with crunchy sides.

item.title: Arils Pomegranate
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Jewel-like and bursting with sweet-tart juice, pomegranate arils make salads sparkle and desserts dazzle. Snack-worthy straight from the spoon.
item.excerpt:encoded: Juicy, ruby-red seeds bursting with sweet-tart flavor.

item.title: Thin Slice Whole Grain Bread
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Soft, hearty, and thinly sliced, this bread is loaded with whole grains for a healthier twist on everyday sandwiches and morning toast.
item.excerpt:encoded: Light, wholesome slices loaded with whole grain goodness.

item.title: Bread Alone
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Rustic, artisan loaves crafted with organic ingredients and old-world techniques. Every slice brings texture, depth, and real bakery soul.
item.excerpt:encoded: Artisan-baked, organic breads with rustic texture and taste.

item.title: Box Chocolate Cake
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Rich, decadent, and easy to whip up, this boxed cake mix bakes into a moist, chocolatey dessert that tastes like it came from a bakery.
item.excerpt:encoded: Rich and moist cake mix for instant chocolatey indulgence.

item.title: Italian White Bread
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: A soft, pillowy loaf with a light crust and mild flavor — ideal for paninis, garlic bread, or soaking up rich sauces. Pure Italian comfort.
item.excerpt:encoded: Soft and fluffy loaf — great for sandwiches or toasting.

item.title: Sweet and Salt Biscut
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: A delicate balance of sweet crunch and savory touch, these biscuits are perfect with tea or as a quick nibble anytime.
item.excerpt:encoded: A crispy snack that perfectly balances sweet and savory.

item.title: Custom Styles
item.dc:creator: groceria

item.title: Kleenex Trusted Care Facial Tissues
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Soft, strong, and gentle on skin — Kleenex Trusted Care tissues are your everyday essential for sniffles, makeup fixes, and small cleanups.
item.excerpt:encoded: Soft, durable tissues for everyday care and comfort.

item.title: Domino Granulated White Sugar
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Pure, fine, and perfectly sweet — this all-purpose sugar is the gold standard for baking, coffee, and sweetening everything in between.
item.excerpt:encoded: Pure, fine sugar ideal for baking and sweetening.

item.title: Gluten-Free Loaf, Cinnamon Raisin
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Soft and fragrant with bursts of sweet raisins and warm cinnamon, this gluten-free loaf delivers cozy comfort without compromise.
item.excerpt:encoded: Warm cinnamon flavor and sweet raisins in a soft, gluten-free loaf.

item.title: Just Fresh Direct100% Pure Honey, Clover
item.dc:creator: groceria
item.content:encoded: Golden, silky, and floral — this raw clover honey is harvested with care and bottled for purity. Perfect for drizzling, sweetening, or spooning straight.
item.excerpt:encoded: Golden, floral honey — raw, natural, and irresistibly sweet.

item.dc:creator: groceria
